string-array.name: Report_Id_1_Query
string-array.item: Current Members| FROM get_all_members(?,?)AS fun left join member on fun.mid=member.id left join membership on fun.msid=membership.id left join programme on fun.pid=programme.id left join programmegroup on fun.pgid=programmegroup.id left join member_view on fun.mid=member_view.id left join staff on fun.ptid=staff.id left join promotion on fun.pmtid=promotion.promotion_id left join involvement on fun.involvementid=involvement.id

string-array.name: Report_Id_133_Query
string-array.item: Membershipless | FROM get_membershipless(?,?)AS fun left join member on fun.mid=member.id left join staff on fun.cmid=staff.id

string-array.name: Report_Id_133_Fields
string-array.item: Member Joining Date|member.joiningdate AS \"Member Joining Date\"

string-array.name: Report_Id_101_Query
string-array.item: All Members Including Historical Members| FROM get_incl_historic_members(?, ?)AS fun left join member on fun.mid=member.id left join membership on fun.msid=membership.id left join programme on fun.pid=programme.id left join programmegroup on fun.pgid=programmegroup.id left join member_view on fun.mid=member_view.id

string-array.name: Report_Id_104_Query
string-array.item: Birthday List|FROM get_birthday_members2(?,?)AS fun left join member on fun.mid=member.id left join membership on fun.msid=membership.id left join programme on fun.pid=programme.id left join programmegroup on fun.pgid=programmegroup.id left join member_view on fun.mid=member_view.id
